content: If I can make a suggestion, I think you could look up some courses on Udemy. There are also several channels on YouTube with free content of excellent quality. If you want, I can send you some links.
Man, I really appreciate it! Can you send me the links via DM?
For sure! I was already wanting to chat with you about your last CRUD app. I'm going to call you on Discord!
If I can bet, I guess she used Phosphor Icons. It is a great library, with a very well written documentation!
